about-me.fast-text: My highest priority is fast load times, lag free interaction. Also I make sure that the website is SEO friendly.
about-me.responsive-text: My layouts are responsive so it will work on any device. Desktop, tablet or mobile.
about-me.intuitive-text: Strong preference for easy to use, intuitive UX/UI. I love to make things which are easy to use and beautiful.
about-me.dynamic-text: Websites don't have to be static, I love making pages come to life. I have strong skills in this.
about-me.text-1: I am a Microsoft Certified Specialist in Programming in HTML5 with JavaScript and CSS3 with 15+ years of experience in front-end development, specializing in Next.js, SSR, SEO, and performance optimization. Skilled in React, Angular, TypeScript, and modern architectures like micro frontends and monorepos, I have expertise across the entire SDLC, ensuring high-quality, scalable applications. Passionate about code quality, accessibility, and Core Web Vitals, I leverage tools like Lighthouse, Jest, Cypress, and Webpack. As an Agile practitioner, I actively contribute to Scrum events, mentoring, and cross-team collaboration, fostering knowledge-sharing and team growth.
about-me.text-2: I spend most of my days programming in NextJs, android app, npm packages, contributing to open source projects and organising local developer user groups.
about-me.text-3: I am currently based in Almere, Netherlands with my wife, son and daughter.
about-me.text-4: Apart from my day to day activities, I like to go for adventurous trip, cooking and listening music.
